LanguageData.Axi_P_FNX45_21CA.label: FNX-45 Tactical
LanguageData.Axi_P_FNX45_21CA.description: A rather large pistol in its own right, the FNX-45 makes up for its size with an equally massive .45 Automatic round, 12 to a magazine. This combination of stopping power and capacity make the FNX-45 a popular choice for boarding parties and guardsmen alike. This particular example is a Tactical variant with raised sights and a threaded barrel for mounting a suppressor.
LanguageData.Axi_P_FNX45_21CA.tools.stock.label: stock
